[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row overlay_dotted=”” css=”.vc_custom_1649936388346{margin-bottom: 100px !important;padding-top: 50px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1497421005684{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”We Build the Better Solution with Experienced Expertise” google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1649928226856{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Bring in the most cost-effective Surface Finishing Plants with all necessary equipment you need around with our expert work specialties

  • Guaranteed Uptime of above 98 percent
  • First-pass yield of above 96 percent
  • Zero Maintenance Motors and Gearboxes
  • Versatile PLC with PC interface
  • Remotely Operated Transporters
  • Automatic Rectifier Control
  • Automatic Dosing Control
  • Filtration and Carbon packing in an off-line sump
  • Streamlined Discharge with a Modular Pipe System.

font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:30|text_align:center” google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1649835669873{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

US Automation, a pioneer in the sector, offers complete corrosion protection solutions on all types of substrates in a variety of industries, including automobiles, hardware, electronics, white goods, jewellery, power supplies, aeronautics, railways, and defense, to name a few.

Our products span from traditional manual/automatic systems to specific applications such as plating on cycle spokes, cycle rims, the interior of gun barrels, and continuous lines for sheets/strips/wires.

US Automation, a global leader in plating systems, has built over 250+ systems across 7 countries. With 180+ active systems, our long-lasting and superior quality products have propelled our success in the international market. We pride ourselves on delivering excellence and innovation, making us the preferred choice for businesses seeking top-notch plating solutions.

meta._seopress_titles_title: Surface Finishing Equipment Company  - US Automation
meta._seopress_titles_desc: US Automationis a Surface Finishing Equipment Company that offers ultimate solutions for surface finishing, automation, and environment.
